original_text:
Cool Jewels
Per quanto riguarda il tema e la grafica di questa slot machine prodotta dalla software house Williams Interactive (WMS), non c’è tantissimo da dire. La grafica è ridotta veramente all’essenziale e, se non si sapesse aprendo il gioco che si tratta di una slot machine, si potrebbe tranquillamente scambiare Cool Jewels per uno dei tanti giochi online della serie Candy Crush Saga o Bubble Witch.
Lo sfondo di colore azzurro cielo mette in risalto la griglia su cui scorrono i simboli rappresentati tutti da pietre preziose di forma e colori diversi.
Non ci sono ovviamente animazioni di nessun tipo, figuriamoci effetti speciali o tecnologie in 3D, Cool Jewels punta tutto sul gameplay, strizzando un occhio a quei giocatori che sono rimasti legati alle vecchie slot machine da sala bar, che possono ritrovare in questo gioco un piacevole ritorno alle origini dei giochi di slot per quanto riguarda il compartimento grafico, ma saranno piacevolmente sorpresi nel trovare poi un gameplay divertente, articolato e molto moderno.
Caratteristiche principali della slot
Cool Jewels è una slot che potrebbe essere definita in qualche modo anomala: a una grafica ridotta ai minimi termini associa una modalità di gioco che è invece complessa e molto coinvolgente.
Si può notare questo anche da una prima occhiata: si può subito vedere subito che anche la struttura di gioco non è quella tradizionale, ma che il classico schema 5 rulli e 3 righe è sostituito da una griglia 6×6.
Altra particolarità è che non esistono linee di pagamento, sostituite da dei contatori che si trovano ai lati dei rulli. Le scommesse dunque non vanno per linea ma per giro, e sono comprese tra un minimo di 0,50 monete fino a un massimo di 200, per accontentare sia i giocatori più prudenti sia i cosiddetti high rollers.
Interessanti le possibilità di vincita: giocando a Cool Jewels si può ambire a un premio massimo pari a ben 7.500 volte il valore della puntata.
Il ritorno teorico al giocator (return to player o RTP)e di questa slot machine è in linea con la maggior parte dei giochi della William Interactive, attestandosi su un canonico 96,1%.
Simboli e funzionalità speciali di Cool Jewels
In questo gioco a farla da protagonisti sono i gioielli, di tutte le forme e di tutti i colori, tra cui il rosso, il giallo, il turchese, rosa, blu e verde. Per ottenere delle vincite è necessario che si presenti una combinazione di almeno quattro simboli identici su rulli adiacenti, sia in senso orizzontale che in senso verticale. Tra i simboli ne troviamo anche uno che rappresenta un moltiplicatore x10: quando si ottengono delle combinazioni vincenti con questo simbolo l’intera vincita sarà moltiplicata per dieci volte.
Cool Jewels presenta diverse tipologie di Wild, ben quattro: Shocking Wild, Unstable Wild, Shattering Wild, e Persisting Wild. L’Actived Unstable Wild distruggerà tutti i simboli negli spazi che lo circondano, un Shattering Wild attivato distruggerà tutti i simboli adiacenti sia in senso verticale che orizzontale e lo  Shocking Wild attivato infine distruggerà tutti i simboli adiacenti collocati in diagonale rispetto ad esso.

raw_translation.response:
Cool Jewels
When it comes to the theme and graphics of this slot machine, produced by software house Williams Interactive (WMS), there isn't much to say. The graphics are really reduced to the essentials and, if you didn't know that it's a slot machine when you open the game, you could easily mistake Cool Jewels for one of the many online games in the Candy Crush Saga or Bubble Witch series.

The light blue background highlights the grid on which the symbols, all represented by precious stones of different shapes and colours, scroll. There are obviously no animations of any kind, let alone special effects or 3D technologies. Cool Jewels focuses entirely on gameplay, winking at those players who have remained attached to old bar slot machines, who can find in this game a pleasant return to the origins of slot games in terms of graphics, but will be pleasantly surprised to find a fun, articulated and very modern gameplay.

Main features of the slot
Cool Jewels is a slot that could be defined in some way as anomalous: to graphics reduced to a minimum, it associates a gameplay that is instead complex and very engaging.

This can be noticed at first glance: you can immediately see that even the game structure is not traditional, but that the classic 5-reel and 3-row scheme is replaced by a 6x6 grid. Another feature is that there are no paylines, replaced by counters located on the sides of the reels. Therefore, bets are not made per line but per spin, ranging from a minimum of 0.50 coins to a maximum of 200, to please both the most cautious players and the so-called high rollers.

The possibilities of winning are interesting: playing Cool Jewels one can aspire to a maximum prize equal to 7,500 times the value of the bet. The theoretical return to player (RTP) of this slot machine is in line with the majority of William Interactive's games, standing at a canonical 96.1%.

Symbols and special features of Cool Jewels
In this game, the protagonists are jewels, of all shapes and colours, including red, yellow, turquoise, pink, blue and green. To obtain winnings, it is necessary to have a combination of at least four identical symbols on adjacent reels, both horizontally and vertically. Among the symbols, there is also one that represents a x10 multiplier: when winning combinations are obtained with this symbol, the entire win will be multiplied by ten times.

Cool Jewels features several types of Wilds, as many as four: Shocking Wild, Unstable Wild, Shattering Wild, and Persisting Wild. The activated Unstable Wild will destroy all symbols in the spaces around it, an activated Shattering Wild will destroy all adjacent symbols both vertically and horizontally and the activated Shocking Wild will finally destroy all adjacent symbols placed diagonally with respect to it.

raw_translation.response:
Cool Jewels

When it comes to the theme and graphics of this slot machine produced by software company Williams Interactive (WMS), there isn't much to say. The graphics are really reduced to the essential and if one didn't know that it was a slot game, one could easily mistake Cool Jewels for one of the many online games in the Candy Crush Saga or Bubble Witch series. The sky blue background highlights the grid on which symbols represented by different shaped and colored precious stones scroll by. Naturally, there are no animations of any kind, let alone 3D technology or special effects; Cool Jewels focuses everything on gameplay and winks to those players who have remained attached to the old slot machines found in bars, which can find in this game a pleasant return to the origins of slot games in terms of graphic design, but will be pleasantly surprised to find a fun, articulate and very modern gameplay.

Main features of the slot

Cool Jewels is a slot that could be defined in some way anomalous: it associates minimalistic graphics with a game mode that is complex and engaging. One can notice this just by taking a first glance: you can immediately see that even the game structure is not traditional, but that the classic 5-reel and 3-row pattern is replaced by a 6x6 grid. Another particularity is that there are no pay lines, replaced by counters that are found on the sides of the reels. Bets, therefore, do not go for maximum or minimum line bet, but for the total turn, ranging from a minimum of 0.50 coins to a maximum of 200, in order to satisfy both the more cautious players and the so-called high rollers. The possibilities for winning is interesting: by playing Cool Jewels you can aspire to a maximum prize equal to up to 7,500 times the value of the bet. 

The theoretical return to player (RTP) of this slot machine is in line with most of the games from William Interactive, standing at a canonical 96.1%.

Symbols and special features of Cool Jewels

In this game, the protagonist is all about jewels, of all shapes and colors, including red, yellow, turquoise, pink, blue and green. To obtain winnings, it is necessary to have at least four identical symbols in adjacent columns or rows, both horizontally and vertically. Among the symbols, we also find one that represents a x10 multiplier: when winning combinations are obtained with this symbol, the entire prize is multiplied by ten times.

Cool Jewels presents several types of Wilds, four in total: Shocking Wild, Unstable Wild, Shattering Wild, and Persisting Wild. The Activated Unstable Wild destroys all symbols in the spaces around it, an Activated Shattering Wild destroys all adjacent symbols both vertically and horizontally, and the Activated Shocking Wild finally destroys all adjacent symbols placed diagonally to it.

message.content:
Cool Jewels

When it comes to the theme and graphics of this slot machine produced by software company Williams Interactive (WMS), there isn't much to say. The graphics are really reduced to the essential and if one didn't know that it was a slot game, one could easily mistake Cool Jewels for one of the many online games in the Candy Crush Saga or Bubble Witch series. The sky blue background highlights the grid on which symbols represented by different shaped and colored precious stones scroll by. Naturally, there are no animations of any kind, let alone 3D technology or special effects; Cool Jewels focuses everything on gameplay and winks to those players who have remained attached to the old slot machines found in bars, which can find in this game a pleasant return to the origins of slot games in terms of graphic design, but will be pleasantly surprised to find a fun, articulate and very modern gameplay.

Main features of the slot

Cool Jewels is a slot that could be defined in some way anomalous: it associates minimalistic graphics with a game mode that is complex and engaging. One can notice this just by taking a first glance: you can immediately see that even the game structure is not traditional, but that the classic 5-reel and 3-row pattern is replaced by a 6x6 grid. Another particularity is that there are no pay lines, replaced by counters that are found on the sides of the reels. Bets, therefore, do not go for maximum or minimum line bet, but for the total turn, ranging from a minimum of 0.50 coins to a maximum of 200, in order to satisfy both the more cautious players and the so-called high rollers. The possibilities for winning is interesting: by playing Cool Jewels you can aspire to a maximum prize equal to up to 7,500 times the value of the bet. 

The theoretical return to player (RTP) of this slot machine is in line with most of the games from William Interactive, standing at a canonical 96.1%.

Symbols and special features of Cool Jewels

In this game, the protagonist is all about jewels, of all shapes and colors, including red, yellow, turquoise, pink, blue and green. To obtain winnings, it is necessary to have at least four identical symbols in adjacent columns or rows, both horizontally and vertically. Among the symbols, we also find one that represents a x10 multiplier: when winning combinations are obtained with this symbol, the entire prize is multiplied by ten times.

Cool Jewels presents several types of Wilds, four in total: Shocking Wild, Unstable Wild, Shattering Wild, and Persisting Wild. The Activated Unstable Wild destroys all symbols in the spaces around it, an Activated Shattering Wild destroys all adjacent symbols both vertically and horizontally, and the Activated Shocking Wild finally destroys all adjacent symbols placed diagonally to it.

raw_translation_without_faq.response: Cool Jewels is an online slot game developed by Williams Interactive (WMS) that has a minimalist design reminiscent of popular mobile games such as Candy Crush Saga and Bubble Witch. The graphics are simple, featuring precious stones of different colors and shapes scrolling by on a sky blue background. However, the gameplay is complex and engaging, with a unique 6x6 grid structure and no pay lines, but instead counters on the sides of the reels. The betting range is from 0.50 coins to 200, with a maximum payout of up to 7,500 times the bet value. The main symbols are jewels, and players must match at least four identical symbols in adjacent columns or rows, both horizontally and vertically, to win. There is also a x10 multiplier symbol that multiplies the entire prize won. Cool Jewels features several types of Wilds, including Shocking Wild, Unstable Wild, Shattering Wild, and Persisting Wild, which all have different effects on adjacent symbols depending on the type. The theoretical return to player (RTP) for this slot machine is 96.1%.

Review: Cool Jewels

When it comes to the theme and graphics of this slot machine produced by software company Williams Interactive (WMS), there isn't much to say. The graphics are really reduced to the essential and if one didn't know that it was a slot game, one could easily mistake Cool Jewels for one of the many online games in the Candy Crush Saga or Bubble Witch series. The sky blue background highlights the grid on which symbols represented by different shaped and colored precious stones scroll by. Naturally, there are no animations of any kind, let alone 3D technology or special effects; Cool Jewels focuses everything on gameplay and winks to those players who have remained attached to the old slot machines found in bars, which can find in this game a pleasant return to the origins of slot games in terms of graphic design, but will be pleasantly surprised to find a fun, articulate and very modern gameplay.

Main features of the slot

Cool Jewels is a slot that could be defined in some way anomalous: it associates minimalistic graphics with a game mode that is complex and engaging. One can notice this just by taking a first glance: you can immediately see that even the game structure is not traditional, but that the classic 5-reel and 3-row pattern is replaced by a 6x6 grid. Another particularity is that there are no pay lines, replaced by counters that are found on the sides of the reels. Bets, therefore, do not go for maximum or minimum line bet, but for the total turn, ranging from a minimum of 0.50 coins to a maximum of 200, in order to satisfy both the more cautious players and the so-called high rollers. The possibilities for winning is interesting: by playing Cool Jewels you can aspire to a maximum prize equal to up to 7,500 times the value of the bet. 

The theoretical return to player (RTP) of this slot machine is in line with most of the games from William Interactive, standing at a canonical 96.1%.

Symbols and special features of Cool Jewels

In this game, the protagonist is all about jewels, of all shapes and colors, including red, yellow, turquoise, pink, blue and green. To obtain winnings, it is necessary to have at least four identical symbols in adjacent columns or rows, both horizontally and vertically. Among the symbols, we also find one that represents a x10 multiplier: when winning combinations are obtained with this symbol, the entire prize is multiplied by ten times.

Cool Jewels presents several types of Wilds, four in total: Shocking Wild, Unstable Wild, Shattering Wild, and Persisting Wild. The Activated Unstable Wild destroys all symbols in the spaces around it, an Activated Shattering Wild destroys all adjacent symbols both vertically and horizontally, and the Activated Shocking Wild finally destroys all adjacent symbols placed diagonally to it.

response.headline: Exploring the Wild Side of Cool Jewels
response.content:
If you're looking for some electrifying entertainment, Cool Jewels slot game hits all the right buttons. This game doesn't just dazzle its players with sparkling gems and jewels; it also introduces them to some heart-pumping wilds.

The Shocking Wild will leave you feeling like you've just grabbed an electric fence, but in a good way! This bad boy will destroy all adjacent diagonal symbols, making way for some electrifying wins.

The Unstable Wild is like a can of soda that's been shaken vigorously. Once activated, it will destroy all symbols in the spaces around it. Looks like it's time for some fizzy fun!

Think you can handle a Shattering Wild? This Wild will destroy all symbols adjacent both vertically and horizontally. So, brace yourselves and don't Shatter under the pressure of these Wilds!

Finally, we have the Persisting Wild, which stays on the reels for a certain amount of time, increasing the chances of winning big. It's a glimmer of hope in a game filled with explosions!

Overall, Cool Jewels' Wilds add a unique twist to the traditional slot game, and the variety of Wilds keeps things exciting. Just remember, when the Wilds start to pop, keep your cool and watch those jewels slink into your pocket.

meta.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
meta.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Cool Jewels".

Please provide the following:

- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we like". (4 bullet points)
- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we don't like". (2 bullet pints)
- SEO optimized meta title with a maximum length of 45 characters. Include the words "play" and "free". Capitalize according to AP rules.
- SEO optimized, neutral meta description, explaining the review with a maximum length of 20 words. Include the words "play" and "free".

Respond with a JSON using the keys "pros" (simple array), "cons" (simple array), "meta_title" and "meta_description". 

Review:
 
Gameplay and Features

Unlike most slot machines, Cool Jewels has a complex and engaging gameplay. The game structure is not traditional, with a 6x6 grid instead of the classic 5-reel and 3-row pattern. There are no pay lines, but counters on the sides of the reels substitute them. Bets range from a minimum of 0.50 coins to a maximum of 200 while aspiring to a maximum prize equal to up to 7,500 times the bet. Cool Jewels features several types of Wilds: Shocking Wild, Unstable Wild, Shattering Wild, and Persisting Wild, which destroy symbols in different ways and directions. 

Betting Range and Payouts

Cool Jewels offers a total turn to place bets instead of maximum or minimum line bets, ranging from 0.50 coins to 200 coins. The maximum prize achievable is up to 7,500 times the bet. The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.1%, which is in line with most slot games from Williams Interactive.

Symbols and Winning

Cool Jewels is themed around jewels of red, yellow, turquoise, pink, blue, and green. Winning combinations need at least four identical symbols in adjacent columns or rows (horizontally or vertically). Symbols also include a x10 multiplier, which multiplies the entire prize ten times when involved in winning combinations.

Wilds and Multipliers

Cool Jewels features four types of Wilds: Shocking Wild, Unstable Wild, Shattering Wild, and Persisting Wild. Activated Unstable Wild destroys symbols around it, Activated Shattering Wild destroys adjacent symbols vertically and horizontally, and Activated Shocking Wild destroys adjacent symbols placed diagonally. There is also a x10 multiplier that multiplies the entire prize ten times when involved in winning combinations.

Graphics and Design

Cool Jewels has a minimalistic design with a sky blue background highlighting the 6x6 grid on which symbols represented by different shaped and colored precious stones roll. There are no animations, 3D technology, or special effects. Cool Jewels aims to focus on gameplay rather than graphics, which winks to old slot machines found in bars. While those who enjoy modern graphics and animation may not find Cool Jewels very engaging, those who appreciate the origins of slot games will find its graphic design appealing.

Review: Cool Jewels

When it comes to the theme and graphics of this slot machine produced by software company Williams Interactive (WMS), there isn't much to say. The graphics are really reduced to the essential and if one didn't know that it was a slot game, one could easily mistake Cool Jewels for one of the many online games in the Candy Crush Saga or Bubble Witch series. The sky blue background highlights the grid on which symbols represented by different shaped and colored precious stones scroll by. Naturally, there are no animations of any kind, let alone 3D technology or special effects; Cool Jewels focuses everything on gameplay and winks to those players who have remained attached to the old slot machines found in bars, which can find in this game a pleasant return to the origins of slot games in terms of graphic design, but will be pleasantly surprised to find a fun, articulate and very modern gameplay.

Main features of the slot

Cool Jewels is a slot that could be defined in some way anomalous: it associates minimalistic graphics with a game mode that is complex and engaging. One can notice this just by taking a first glance: you can immediately see that even the game structure is not traditional, but that the classic 5-reel and 3-row pattern is replaced by a 6x6 grid. Another particularity is that there are no pay lines, replaced by counters that are found on the sides of the reels. Bets, therefore, do not go for maximum or minimum line bet, but for the total turn, ranging from a minimum of 0.50 coins to a maximum of 200, in order to satisfy both the more cautious players and the so-called high rollers. The possibilities for winning is interesting: by playing Cool Jewels you can aspire to a maximum prize equal to up to 7,500 times the value of the bet. 

The theoretical return to player (RTP) of this slot machine is in line with most of the games from William Interactive, standing at a canonical 96.1%.

Symbols and special features of Cool Jewels

In this game, the protagonist is all about jewels, of all shapes and colors, including red, yellow, turquoise, pink, blue and green. To obtain winnings, it is necessary to have at least four identical symbols in adjacent columns or rows, both horizontally and vertically. Among the symbols, we also find one that represents a x10 multiplier: when winning combinations are obtained with this symbol, the entire prize is multiplied by ten times.

Cool Jewels presents several types of Wilds, four in total: Shocking Wild, Unstable Wild, Shattering Wild, and Persisting Wild. The Activated Unstable Wild destroys all symbols in the spaces around it, an Activated Shattering Wild destroys all adjacent symbols both vertically and horizontally, and the Activated Shocking Wild finally destroys all adjacent symbols placed diagonally to it.
